body_html:
Fixed by #6030
Python-3 docker images are now available in nightly builds, via Docker Hub.
See: https://hub.docker.com/r/tensorflow/tensorflow/tags/

py3 tags include:
nightly-py3
nightly-devel-py3
nightly-gpu-py3
nightly-devel-gpu-py3

py3 images will also be made available in the next release. They will be pushed to gcr.io and Docker Hub along with the existing non-py3 tags.

body:
Fixed by https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/6030
Python-3 docker images are now available in nightly builds, via Docker Hub.
See: https://hub.docker.com/r/tensorflow/tensorflow/tags/

py3 tags include:
nightly-py3
nightly-devel-py3
nightly-gpu-py3
nightly-devel-gpu-py3

py3 images will also be made available in the next release. They will be pushed to gcr.io and Docker Hub along with the existing non-py3 tags.
